name: compliance
description: Maximum scrutiny profile for regulated environments subject to PCI-DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, or SOX audit requirements

P0.description: Critical compliance violation - emergency remediation within 72 hours

P1.description: High priority compliance finding - fix before next audit checkpoint

P2.description: Medium priority - remediate within audit cycle

P3.description: Low priority - document in risk register and schedule remediation

metadata.purpose: Profile for regulated environments requiring maximum security scrutiny and audit-ready evidence
notes: All factors enabled at maximum weights - regulatory non-compliance carries severe penalties
Lower riskThresholds mean findings escalate to higher severity bands more aggressively
P0 SLA of 3 days aligns with CISA KEV remediation guidance
P3 SLA shortened to 60 days (vs 90 default) - auditors expect no findings older than one quarter
regulated factor weight at 0.25 (maximum) - compliance scope is the primary driver
bpsWeights emphasise controls (0.35) - compensating controls carry more weight in audit contexts
handlesPI weight at 0.25 - PII/PHI handling is a primary audit concern under GDPR/HIPAA
